title: Kindergarten Multimodal Learning Design: Mobile Microlearning-Based Instructional Strategy Development [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of kindergarten curriculum, foundational instructional design theory
context.additional_context: A course where pre-service teachers experience designing multimodal learning applicable to kindergarten settings in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners will explain three or more frameworks for designing kindergarten lessons utilizing multimodal learning.
Learners will create 15-minute microlearning content integrating learning stations and learning trajectory techniques.
Learners will develop multimodal assessment tools for kindergarteners applicable in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
